ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.C.DE113Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindicationContraindications to PrEP usage - Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindication
HIV.C.DE114HIV-positiveContraindications to PrEP usage - HIV-positive
HIV.C.DE115Low estimated creatinine clearanceContraindications to PrEP usage - Low estimated creatinine clearance
HIV.C.DE116Acute HIV infection symptomsContraindications to PrEP usage - Acute HIV infection symptoms
HIV.C.DE117Probable recent exposure to HIVContraindications to PrEP usage - Probable recent exposure to HIV
HIV.C.DE118Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimenContraindications to PrEP usage - Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Contraindications to PrEP usage element

display.value: Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindication
Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen
